basis: The user describes attempting resets and movement and logging meal plans, but there is no report of actual food intake in this turn.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict; shows vulnerability to mood swings but overall willingness to follow guidance.
negative_thought_patterns: Mood-swing related doubt; mentions derailment and a preference for staying simple, hinting at cautious or all-or-nothing tendencies without explicit self-criticism.
emotional_triggers: Mood swings, stress, urges to eat; preference for simple, reliable routines during tougher days.
coaching_notes: Maintain a calm, encouraging tone; emphasize ultra-short, repeatable routines; assess mood state at each session; encourage logging intentions even on high-urge days; consider adding a quick mood-tracking prompt and a contingency plan for high-stress days.
